p: Fresh leaves of G. mollis were collected in April 2015 from Babari village, Zaria, Nigeria. Plant verification was provided by Dr Bala Muhammad, the botanist at the herbarium section of the Department of Biological Sciences, Ahmadu Bello University (ABU), Zaria. Voucher specimen number 161 was deposited at the herbarium at ABU for citations. The collected leaves were dried in a sterile and ventilated room for 2 weeks. The dried leaves were milled to a fine powder using a Mac Salab equipment (Model 2000 LAB Eriez) and kept in a glass container which was then stored in a dark at room temperature (25 ± 3°C).
